title: BRIEF-Delta 9 Receives Renewal Of Health Canada License And Oils Sales Authorization
text:
BRIEF-Delta 9 Receives Renewal Of Health Canada License And Oils Sales Authorization

Stock Markets 3 hours ago (Sep 02, 2019 17:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Delta 9 Receives Renewal Of Health Canada License And Oils Sales Authorization Delta 9 Cannabis Inc : * DELTA 9 RECEIVES RENEWAL OF HEALTH CANADA LICENSE AND OILS SALES AUTHORIZATION * DELTA 9 CANNABIS INC - PROVIDES AN UPDATE ON PRE-ROLLS AND NEW PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT * DELTA 9 CANNABIS INC - RECEIVED ITS RENEWAL LICENSE FROM HEALTH CANADA FOR A TERM OF THREE YEARS * DELTA 9 CANNABIS INC - LICENSE AUTHORIZES DELTA 9 TO CULTIVATE, PROCESS AND SELL CANNABIS FROM ITS WINNIPEG PRODUCTION FACILITY * DELTA 9 CANNABIS INC - TO DATE COMPANY HAS PRODUCED AND SOLD OVER 75,000 CANNABIS PRE-ROLLS. * DELTA 9 CANNABIS INC - PLANS TO RELEASE DRIED SIFT PRODUCTS IN RECREATIONAL CANNABIS MARKET IN Q3 OF 2019. * DELTA 9 CANNABIS INC - EXPECTS THAT RETAIL PRICING FOR DRIED SIFT PRODUCTS WILL BE UP TO $30 PER GRAM.

BRIEF-Delta 9 Receives Renewal Of Health Canada License And Oils Sales Authorization
